title: Tuna and avocado salad with sesame soy dressing
ingredients: ['350g (12 oz) sushi-grade tuna fillets, diced', '50g (2 oz) cucumber, diced', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried crushed chillies, such as Schwartz', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 dessertspoon sesame oil', '100ml (4 fl oz) soy sauce']
